defs: a decorated figures made of flowers.
a decorative figure, line, drawn with powders of different colour, in front of a house, deity, etc.
a shower of flowers.
a shop where flowers, strings and garlands of flowers, etc. are sold.

a continuous pouring of flowers on a person, deity, etc.; a shower of flowers.

a lotus flower.
an eye disease in which the crystalline lens or its capsule becomes opaque, causing partial or total blindness; cataract.
(fig.) that which is comfortable.
a picture drawn or painted (as on a paper, canvas, article, etc.).
anything that is soft (like a flower).
a small basket for carrying flowers.
the fine, dustlike mass of grains that are produced in the anthers or microspore sacs of seed plants, containing the male sexual cells (gametophytes) of the plant; pollen.

the earth.

a man who represents fictitiously or puts on an appearance to deceive another or others.

a string of flowers; a garland.
an arrow of Manmatha, made of flowers (actually meaning the strong desire for sexual union).
